summary: SummaryErborian's Milk & Peel Balm is a daily cleansing and exfoliating oil-in-balm, for flawless-looking skin in just one step.
details: DetailsBenefitsThanks to its resurfacing action, this cleansing balm helps to:Remove makeup and cleanse skin of impurities that have built up during the dayGently exfoliate, leaving skin softer and smootherTighten the appearance of poresKey IngredientsThis cleansing balm is formulated with Exfoliating Enzymes, as well as Sesame Milk, which has been known to visibly smooth skin's surfaceMilk & Peel Balm gently removes dead skin cells and cleanses the skin every dayMade with over 40% botanical oils, this balm transforms into oil and melts on contact with skinFormulated WithoutParabensSulfatesPhthalatesItem 2563425How To UseMassage over dry skin with circular movements, avoiding contact with lips and eyes, until all traces of makeup are eliminated. Rinse off with warm water. It's recommended you try with Erborian's Milk & Peel Mask 1-2 times a week for a smoother, more luminous complexion.IngredientsSunflower Seed Oil Glycerides, Glycerin, Ethylhexyl Stearate, Polysorbate 80, Oryza Sativa Bran Wax / Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Glyceryl Behenate, Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides, Aqua/Water, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Sesamum Indicum Seed Extract/ Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Extract, Polygonum Cuspidatum Root Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Bacillus Ferment, Allantoin, Dibutyl Lauroyl Glutamide, Dibutyl Ethylhexanoyl Glutamide, Butylene Glycol, Propylene Glycol, Tocopherol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Xanthan Gum, Citric Acid, Sorbic Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Parfum/Fragrance.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Massage over dry skin with circular movements, avoiding contact with lips and eyes, until all traces of makeup are eliminated. Rinse off with warm water. It's recommended you try with Erborian's Milk & Peel Mask 1-2 times a week for a smoother, more luminous complexion.
ingredients: Oryza Sativa Bran Wax / Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax
Sesamum Indicum Seed Extract/ Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Extract

reviews.headline: Must have
reviews.comments: This is a great product ! Especially for oily skin when you double cleanse

reviews.headline: I love it!!!
reviews.comments: i feel like the product started working from the first application!  i love the feel and the smell! two thumbs up!

reviews.headline: Works well, just avoid eyes!
reviews.comments: I bought this because I was intrigued by a cleansing balm in a tube, much more hygienic than sticking my fingers into a tub every night to get the balm out. It definitely cleanses well and removes sunscreen and makeup but don't use it on your eyes! It makes my eyes burn if this gets too close. Kind of bummed that I still have to go in with micellar water to remove eye makeup, but will continue to use since I love the feel of an oil cleansing balm and love that it's in a tube.

faceoff_positive.comments: I bought this because I was intrigued by a cleansing balm in a tube, much more hygienic than sticking my fingers into a tub every night to get the balm out. It definitely cleanses well and removes sunscreen and makeup but don't use it on your eyes! It makes my eyes burn if this gets too close. Kind of bummed that I still have to go in with micellar water to remove eye makeup, but will continue to use since I love the feel of an oil cleansing balm and love that it's in a tube.
faceoff_positive.headline: Works well, just avoid eyes!

faceoff_negative.comments: I liked how my skin felt after use, I just don't see myself using this everyday.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not terrible
